mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM TruckInfo WHERE T_ID = #{id} AND T_PASSWORD = #{pw} AND T_isShow = 'Y'
SELECT T_NO AS NO FROM TruckInfo WHERE T_ID = #{id} AND T_isShow = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM TruckImage WHERE TI_T_NO = #{no} AND TI_isShow = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM Menu WHERE M_T_NO = #{no} AND M_isShow ='Y'
SELECT T_NO AS NO, T_CHEF AS CHEF, T_NAME AS NAME, T_PHONE AS PHONE, T_EMAIL AS EMAIL, t_isShow AS isShow FROM TruckInfo WHERE T_ID = #{id} AND T_isShow IN('Y', 'S', 'T', 'R')
SELECT T_NO AS no, T_CHEF AS CHEF, T_NAME AS NAME, T_NUM AS NUM, T_PHONE AS PHONE, T_EMAIL AS EMAIL, T_ID AS ID, T_OPEN AS OPEN FROM TruckInfo WHERE T_NO = #{no} AND T_isShow ='Y'

SELECT T.T_NO NO, T.T_CHEF CHEF, T.T_NAME NAME, T.T_NUM NUM, T.T_PHONE PHONE, T.T_EMAIL EMAIL, T.T_OPEN OPEN, T.T_ID ID, TT.chefImgName chefImgName, TT.chefComment chefComment, TT.truckImgName truckImgName, TT.truckComment truckComment, TT.mmenuImgName mmenuImgName, TT.mmenuComment mmenuComment, TT.mmenuName mmenuName, TT.mmenuPrice mmenuPrice, TT.keyword keyword FROM TRUCKINFO T, (SELECT TI_T_NO AS T_NO, (select ti_savename from TruckImage where ti_grade = 2 and ti_isshow = 'Y' and ti_t_no = #{no}) chefImgName, (select TI_IMGBODY from TruckImage where ti_grade = 2 and ti_isshow = 'Y' and ti_t_no = #{no}) chefComment, (select ti_savename from TruckImage where ti_grade = 1 and ti_isshow = 'Y' and ti_t_no = #{no}) truckImgName, (select TI_IMGBODY from TruckImage where ti_grade = 1 and ti_isshow = 'Y' and ti_t_no = #{no}) truckComment, (select ti_savename from TruckImage where ti_grade = 3 and ti_isshow = 'Y' and ti_t_no = #{no}) mmenuImgName, (select TI_IMGBODY from TruckImage where ti_grade = 3 and ti_isshow = 'Y' and ti_t_no = #{no}) mmenuComment, (select M_NAME from Menu where m_GRADE = 'M' and M_isShow = 'Y' and M_T_NO = #{no}) mmenuName, (select M_Price from Menu where m_GRADE = 'M' and M_isShow = 'Y' and M_T_NO = #{no}) mmenuPrice, (select M_KEYWORD from Menu where m_GRADE = 'M' and M_isShow = 'Y' and M_T_NO = #{no}) keyword FROM TruckImage Ti, Menu M WHERE ti.ti_isshow = 'Y' AND M.M_isshow = 'Y' AND TI.TI_T_NO = #{no} AND TI.TI_T_NO = M.M_T_NO GROUP BY TI_T_NO) TT WHERE T.T_ISSHOW = 'Y' AND T.T_NO = #{no} AND T.T_NO=TT.T_NO
SELECT Ti_NO AS TINO, TI_SAVENAME AS mImgName, TI_IMGBODY AS imgbody, TI_GRADE AS TIGRADE FROM TruckImage WHERE TI_isShow ='Y' AND TI_GRADE = #{tigrade} AND TI_T_NO = #{no} ORDER BY TI_NO DESC

SELECT M_NO AS mNo, M_NAME AS mmenuName, M_PRICE AS mmenuPrice, M_BODY AS mmenuComment, M_SAVENAME AS sname, M_KEYWORD AS keyword FROM Menu WHERE M_isShow ='Y' AND M_GRADE = #{mmenugrade} AND M_T_NO = #{no} ORDER BY M_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TruckInfo VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(T_No), 0) + 1 FROM TruckInfo), #{chef}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{open}, #{email}, #{num}, #{id}, #{pw}, 'S')
INSERT INTO TruckImage VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(TI_No), 0) + 1 FROM TruckImage), #{no}, #{sname}, #{imgbody}, #{tigrade}, 'Y')
INSERT INTO Menu VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(M_No), 0) + 1 FROM Menu), #{no}, #{mmenuName}, #{mmenuPrice}, #{mmenuComment}, #{mmenuImgName}, #{mmenugrade}, #{keyword}, 'Y')
mapper.update: UPDATE TruckInfo SET T_CHEF=#{chef}, T_NAME=#{name}, T_PHONE=#{phone}, T_OPEN=#{open}, T_EMAIL=#{email}, T_NUM=#{num}, T_ID=#{id}, T_ISSHOW='Y' WHERE T_NO=#{no}
UPDATE TruckInfo SET T_PHONE=#{phone}, T_EMAIL=#{email} WHERE T_NO=#{no}
UPDATE TruckImage SET TI_isShow='N' WHERE TI_NO=(select ti_no from TruckImage where TI_SAVENAME=#{sname})
UPDATE Menu SET M_isShow='N' WHERE M_NO=(select M_no from Menu where M_SAVENAME=#{sname} AND M_T_NO=#{no})
UPDATE TruckImage SET TI_IMGBODY=#{imgbody} WHERE TI_NO=(select ti_no from TruckImage where TI_SAVENAME=#{sname})
UPDATE Menu SET M_name=#{mmenuName}, M_Price=#{mmenuPrice}, M_BODY=#{mmenuComment}, m_grade=#{mmenugrade}, m_keyword=#{keyword} WHERE M_NO=(select M_no from menu where m_SAVENAME=#{sname})
